original_title: The Pointer Sisters: Live in Concert
overview: Live performance from the legendary pop trio. Tracks include such classics as 'Jump' and 'I'm So Excited'.  Track listing:  01 Opening  02 Happiness  03 Automatic  04 Fairytale  05 Slow Hand  06 Chain Of Fools  07 Yes We Can, Can  08 He's So Shy  09 Dare Me  10 Band Instrumental  11 Fire  12 I Need You  13 Neutron Dance  14 Jump  15 I'm So Excited  16 Wang Dang Doodle

production_companies.name: Air Music and Media Group plc

title: The Pointer Sisters: Live in Concert
